name: Mickey Mouse
title: Brave Little Tailor

name: Stitch

name: Aurora
title: Dreaming Guardian
action:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Aurora.)
Protective Embrace Your other characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)
flavour: As the princess slumbered, her power awoke.
languages:
{'EN': {'card_id': 12, 'language': 'EN', 'name': 'Aurora', 'title': 'Dreaming Guardian', 'action': "Shift 3 (You may pay 3 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Aurora.)

name: Maleficent
title: Sinister Visitor
flavour: „The princess shall indeed grow in grace and beauty, beloved by all who know her. But before the sun sets on her sixteenth birthday, she shall prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel...“
languages: {'EN': {'card_id': 13, 'language': 'EN', 'name': 'Maleficent', 'title': 'Sinister Visitor', 'action': None, 'flavour': '„The princess shall indeed grow in grace and beauty, beloved by all who know her. Geburtstag untergeht, soll sie sich mit der Spindel eines Spinnrades in den Finger stechen ...“', 'image': 'https://images.lorcania.com/cards/tfc/150_de_maleficent-716.webp'}, 'FR': {'card_id': 13, 'language': 'FR', 'name': 'Maléfique', 'title': 'Sinistre visiteuse', 'action': None, 'flavour': '"La princesse, en grandissant, aura la grâce et la beauté. Mais ma volonté est telle qu\'avant l\'aube de ses seize ans, elle se piquera le doigt à la pointe d\'une quenouille."', 'image': 'https://images.lorcania.com/cards/tfc/150_fr_maleficent-716.webp'}}

name: Moana
title: Of Motunui
action: <mark>WE CAN FIX IT</mark> Whenever this character quests, you may ready your other Princess characters. They can‘t quest for the rest of this turn.
flavour: „I am Moana of Motunui. You will board my boat, sail across the sea, and restore the heart of Te Fiti.“
languages: {'EN': {'card_id': 14, 'language': 'EN', 'name': 'Moana', 'title': 'Of Motunui', 'action': '<mark>WE CAN FIX IT</mark> Whenever this character quests, you may ready your other Princess characters. You will board my boat, sail\racross the sea, and restore the heart of Te Fiti.“', 'image': 'https://images.lorcania.com/cards/tfc/14_en_moana-716.webp'}, 'DE': {'card_id': 14, 'language': 'DE', 'name': 'Vaiana', 'title': 'Von Motunui', 'action': '<mark>WIR KRIEGEN DAS HIN</mark> Jedes Mal, wenn dieser Charakter erkundet, darfst du deine anderen Prinzessinnen bereit machen. Du kommst jetzt auf mein Boot, segelst über das Meer und bringst das Herz nach Te Fiti zurück.“', 'image': 'https://images.lorcania.com/cards/tfc/14_de_moana-716.webp'}, 'FR': {'card_id': 14, 'language': 'FR', 'name': 'Vaiana', 'title': 'de Motunui', 'action': "<mark>NOUS ALLONS LE RÉPARER</mark> Lorsque ce personnage est envoyé à l'aventure, vous pouvez redresser vos autres personnages Princesse. Tu vas monter sur mon bateau, traverser la mer et restituer le cœur de Te Fiti."', 'image': 'https://images.lorcania.com/cards/tfc/14_fr_moana-716.webp'}}

action:

flavour: He always goes for the clean sweep.

name: Kristoff
title: Official Ice Master
flavour:

action: <mark>SHOW ME</mark> ↷, 3 ⬡ - If you have no cards in your hand, draw a card.

action: <mark>CONSIDER THE COCONUT</mark> Whenever you play a character, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.
flavour: The coconut is a versatile gift from the gods, used to make nearly everything - including baskets to carry more coconuts.
languages: {'EN': {'card_id': 55, 'language': 'EN', 'name': 'Coconut Basket', 'title': None, 'action': '<mark>CONSIDER THE COCONUT</mark> Whenever you play a character,\ryou may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.', 'flavour': 'The coconut is a versatile gift from the gods, used to make nearly everything - including baskets to carry more coconuts.', 'image': 'https://images.lorcania.com/cards/tfc/166_en_coconut_basket-716.webp'}, 'DE': {'card_id': 55, 'language': 'DE', 'name': 'Kokosnusskorb', 'title': None, 'action': '<mark>DENK NUR AN DIE KOKOSNUSS</mark> Jedes Mal, wenn du einen Charakter ausspielst, darfst du bis zu 2 Schaden von einem Charakter deiner Wahl entfernen.', 'flavour': 'Die Kokosnuss ist ein vielseitiges Geschenk der Götter, aus der man fast alles herstellen kann - auch Körbe, um mehr Kokosnüsse zu transportieren.', 'image': 'https://images.lorcania.com/cards/tfc/166_de_coconut_basket-716.webp'}, 'FR': {'card_id': 55, 'language': 'FR', 'name': 'Panier De Noix De Coco', 'title': None, 'action': "<mark>NOUS AVONS LA NOIX DE COCO</mark> Lorsque vous jouez un personnage, vous pouvez choisir un autre personnage et lui retirer jusqu'à 2 jetons Dommage.", 'flavour': 'La noix de coco est un don des dieux dont on peut tirer\npratiquement tout ce dont on a besoin… y compris des paniers pour transporter encore plus de noix de coco.', 'image': 'https://images.lorcania.com/cards/tfc/166_fr_coconut_basket-716.webp'}}

name: Mickey Mouse
title: True Friend
flavour: As long as he‘s around, newcomers to the Great Illuminary will always get a warm welcome.

name: Develop Your Brain
action: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the other on the bottom of the deck.
flavour:
„Knowledge, wisdom−there‘s the real power!“
−Merlin

{'EN': {'card_id': 58, 'language': 'EN', 'name': 'Develop Your Brain', 'title': None, 'action': 'Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the other on the bottom of the deck.', 'flavour': '„Knowledge, wisdom−there‘s the real power!“\x03

name: Aurora
title: Regal Princess
flavour: „They say if you dream a thing more than once, it‘s sure to come true!“
languages: {'EN': {'card_id': 59, 'language': 'EN', 'name': 'Aurora', 'title': 'Regal Princess', 'action': None, 'flavour': '„They say if you dream a thing more than once,\x03 it‘s sure to come true!“', 'image': 'https://images.lorcania.com/cards/tfc/140_en_aurora-716.webp'}, 'DE': {'card_id': 59, 'language': 'DE', 'name': 'Aurora', 'title': 'Vornehme Prinzessin', 'action': None, 'flavour': '„Es heißt, wenn man etwas bestimmtes immer wieder träumt, erfüllt sich der Traum!“', 'image': 'https://images.lorcania.com/cards/tfc/140_de_aurora-716.webp'}, 'FR': {'card_id': 59, 'language': 'FR', 'name': 'Aurore', 'title': 'Princesse Royale', 'action': None, 'flavour': '"Mais si on fait le même rêve plusieurs fois, on dit qu\'il se réalise un jour."', 'image': 'https://images.lorcania.com/cards/tfc/140_fr_aurora-716.webp'}}

name: Lantern
action: <mark>BIRTHDAY LIGHTS</mark> ↷ - You pay 1 ⬡ less for the next character you play this turn.
flavour: Lanterns fill the sky on one special night, beacons of hope and love.

name: Maleficent
title: Biding Her Time

name: Belle
title: Inventive Engineer
action: <mark>TINKER</mark> Whenever this character quests, you pay 1 ⬡ less for the next item you play this turn.
flavour: A little ingenuity and a lot of heart will take you far  in this world.

name: Just in Time
action: You may play a character with cost 5 or less for free.
flavour: The best heroes always arrive at the perfect moment−  whether they know it or not.

name: Mickey Mouse
title: Detective
action: <mark>GET A CLUE</mark> When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavour: Wherever the seaweed had come from, Mickey was sure of one thing: something fishy was going on.
languages: {'EN': {'card_id': 73, 'language': 'EN', 'name': 'Mickey Mouse', 'title': 'Detective', 'action': '<mark>GET A CLUE</mark> When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.', 'flavour': 'Wherever the seaweed had come from, Mickey was sure of one thing: something fishy was going on.', 'image': 'https://images.lorcania.com/cards/tfc/154_en_mickey_mouse-716.webp'}, 'DE': {'card_id': 73, 'language': 'DE', 'name': 'Micky Maus', 'title': 'Detektiv', 'action': '<mark>FINDE EINEN HINWEIS</mark> Wenn du diesen Charakter ausspielst, darfst du die oberste Karte deines Decks verdeckt und erschöpft in deinen Tintenvorrat legen.', 'flavour': 'Wo auch immer das Seegras herkommt, Micky war sich einer Sache sicher: Irgendetwas war hier faul.', 'image': 'https://images.lorcania.com/cards/tfc/154_de_mickey_mouse-716.webp'}, 'FR': {'card_id': 73, 'language': 'FR', 'name': 'Mickey Mouse', 'title': 'Détective', 'action': "<mark>UN INDICE</mark> Lorsque vous jouez ce personnage, vous pouvez placer la première carte de votre pioche dans votre réserve d'encre, face cachée et épuisée.", 'flavour': "D'où que proviennent ces algues, Mickey Mouse était sûr d'une chose : il y avait anguille sous roche.", 'image': 'https://images.lorcania.com/cards/tfc/154_fr_mickey_mouse-716.webp'}}

name: Aurora
title: Briar Rose

name: Jasmine
title: Disguised

name: Tinker Bell
title: Giant Fairy
action:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Tinker Bell.)
ROCK THE BOAT When you play this character, deal 1 damage to each opposing character.
PUNY PIRATE! During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may deal 2 damage to chosen opposing character.
languages:

name: Grab Your Sword
action:
(A character with cost 5 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.)
Deal 2 damage to each opposing character.
flavour: We don't likewhat we don't understandIn fact, it scares us

name: Anna
title: Heir to Arendelle
action: <mark>LOVING HEART</mark> When you play this character, if you have a character named Elsa in play, choose an opposing character. The chosen character doesn't ready at the start of their next turn.
flavour: “Two sisters, one mind.”
languages: {'EN': {'card_id': 119, 'language': 'EN', 'name': 'Anna', 'title': 'Heir to Arendelle', 'action': "<mark>LOVING HEART</mark> When you play this character, if you have a character named Elsa in play, choose an opposing character. title: Spectacular Singer

flavour: “The road to true love may be barred by still many more dangers, which you alone will have to face.” −Flora

name: Aladdin
title: Street Rat
action: <mark>IMPROVISE</mark> When you play this character each opponent loses 1 lore.
flavour: It can be hard to tell the difference between a diamond in the rough and someone who's just, well, rough.
languages: {'EN': {'card_id': 128, 'language': 'EN', 'name': 'Aladdin', 'title': 'Street Rat', 'action': '<mark>IMPROVISE</mark> When you play this character each opponent loses 1 lore.', 'flavour': "It can be hard to tell the difference between a diamond in the rough and someone who's just, well, rough.", 'image': 'https://images.lorcania.com/cards/tfc/105_en_aladdin-716.webp'}, 'DE': {'card_id': 128, 'language': 'DE', 'name': 'Aladdin', 'title': 'Straßenjunge', 'action': '<mark>MIR WIRD SCHON WAS EINFALLEN</mark> Wenn du diesen Charakter ausspielst, verlieren alle gegnerischen Mitspielenden je 1 Legende.', 'flavour': 'Es ist oft schwer zu erkennen, wer ein Rohdiamant ist und wer einfach nur, nun ja, rau ist.', 'image': 'https://images.lorcania.com/cards/tfc/105_de_aladdin-716.webp'}, 'FR': {'card_id': 128, 'language': 'FR', 'name': 'Aladdin', 'title': 'Vaurien', 'action': '<mark>IMPROVISE</mark> Lorsque vous jouez ce personnage, chaque adversaire perd 1 éclat de Lore.', 'flavour': "Il est parfois difficile de distinguer un diamant à l'état brut d'une personne qui… euh… est une brute.", 'image': 'https://images.lorcania.com/cards/tfc/105_fr_aladdin-716.webp'}}

name: Mickey Mouse
title: Artful Rogue
action:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.)

flavour: Quiet as a . . . well, you know.
languages:
{'EN': {'card_id': 143, 'language': 'EN', 'name': 'Mickey Mouse', 'title': 'Artful Rogue', 'action': "Shift 5 (You may pay 5 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.)

name: Mad Hatter
title: Gracious Host
action: <mark>TEA PARTY</mark> Whenever this character is challenged, you may draw a card.
flavour: Mad Hatter: “Would you like a little more tea?” Alice: “I haven't had any yet, so I can't very well take more.”
languages:
{'EN': {'card_id': 179, 'language': 'EN', 'name': 'Mad Hatter', 'title': 'Gracious Host', 'action': '<mark>TEA PARTY</mark> Whenever this character is challenged, you may draw a card.', 'flavour': "Mad Hatter: “Would you like a little more tea?”

name: Steal from the Rich
action: Whenever one of your characters quests this turn, each opponent loses 1 lore.
flavour: “Wonder how much ol' Prince John spent on all those fancy locks.” −Little John

flavour: “He's gotta have a weakness, because everybody's got a weakness.”

name: Dinner Bell
action: <mark>YOU KNOW WHAT HAPPENS</mark> ↷, 2 ⬡ − Draw cards equal to the damage on chosen character of yours, then banish them.
flavour: The delicate sound of impending doom.
languages: {'EN': {'card_id': 229, 'language': 'EN', 'name': 'Dinner Bell', 'title': None, 'action': '<mark>YOU KNOW WHAT HAPPENS</mark> ↷, 2 ⬡ − Draw cards equal to the damage on chosen character of yours, then banish them.', 'flavour': 'The delicate sound of impending doom.', 'image': 'https://images.lorcania.com/cards/rotf/134_en_dinner_bell-716.webp'}, 'DE': {'card_id': 229, 'language': 'DE', 'name': 'Tischglocke', 'title': None, 'action': '<mark>DU WEIßT, WAS PASSIERT</mark> ↷, 2 ⬡ − Wähle einen deiner Charaktere und zähle den Schaden auf ihm. name: Elsa
title: Gloves Off
action: Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3 ※)
flavour: The power of ice may not stop the flood, but it will help protect Lorcana.
languages: {'EN': {'card_id': 230, 'language': 'EN', 'name': 'Elsa', 'title': 'Gloves Off', 'action': 'Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3 ※)', 'flavour': 'The power of ice may not stop the flood, but it will help protect Lorcana.', 'image': 'https://images.lorcania.com/cards/rotf/39_en_elsa-716.webp'}, 'DE': {'card_id': 230, 'language': 'DE', 'name': 'Elsa', 'title': 'Ohne Handschuhe', 'action': 'Herausfordern +3 (Während dieser Charakter herausfordert, erhält er +3 ※)', 'flavour': 'Das Eis kann die Flut vielleicht nicht aufhalten, aber es wird dabei helfen, Lorcana zu beschützen.', 'image': None}, 'FR': {'card_id': 230, 'language': 'FR', 'name': 'Elsa', 'title': 'Sans gants', 'action': "Offensif +3 (Lorsqu'il défie, ce personnage gagne +3 ※)", 'flavour': "Le pouvoir de la glace n'arrêtera peut-être pas\nl'inondation, mais il aidera à protéger Lorcana.", 'image': 'https://images.lorcania.com/cards/rotf/39_fr_elsa-716.webp'}}

name: Merlin
title: Shapeshifter
action: <mark>BATTLE OF WITS</mark> Whenever one of your other characters is returned to your hand from play, this character gets +1 ◆ this turn.
flavour: “Oh, blast it all−I can’t make up my mind.”
languages: {'EN': {'card_id': 231, 'language': 'EN', 'name': 'Merlin', 'title': 'Shapeshifter', 'action': '<mark>BATTLE OF WITS</mark> Whenever one of your other characters is returned to your hand from play, this character gets +1 ◆ this turn.', 'flavour': '“Oh, blast it all−I can’t make up my mind.”', 'image': 'https://images.lorcania.com/cards/rotf/53_en_merlin-716.webp'}, 'DE': {'card_id': 231, 'language': 'DE', 'name': 'Merlin', 'title': 'Formwandler', 'action': '<mark>KAMPF DER GEISTER</mark> Dieser Charakter erhält jedes Mal, wenn einer deiner anderen Charaktere aus dem Spiel auf deine Hand zurück kehrt, in diesem Zug +1 ◆.', 'flavour': '„Verflixt nochmal - ich kann mich nicht entscheiden.“', 'image': None}, 'FR': {'card_id': 231, 'language': 'FR', 'name': 'Merlin', 'title': 'Métamorphe', 'action': "<mark>BATAILLE D'ESPRITS</mark> Chaque fois que vous renvoyez l'un de vos autres personnages dans\nvotre main, ce personnage gagne +1◆ pour le\nreste du tour.", 'flavour': None, 'image': 'https://images.lorcania.com/cards/rotf/53_fr_merlin-716.webp'}}

title: Squirrel
action: <mark>LOOK BEFORE YOU LEAP</mark> When you play this character and when he leaves play, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.
flavour: “You can’t always trust to luck, boy.”
